full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Abbreviated Proposals for Internal Audit and Evaluation Consultant Services

**Reference Number:** MX-22643744532
**Solicitation Number:** AUDIT2022
**Publication Date:** 2022-12-21
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-31T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-01-31

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking Abbreviated Proposals from consulting firms to establish a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for the provision of internal audit and evaluation professional services. The services will be required on an "as and when" basis, with the majority of the work taking place at the Head Office location in Ottawa, Ontario. Occasional visits to Regional and Site offices across Canada may also be necessary.

**Services required:**

* Internal audit and evaluation professional services
* Work will be carried out at the Head Office location in Ottawa, Ontario, with occasional visits to Regional and Site offices across Canada

**Subcontracting and Trade Agreements:**

* This tender is open to firms with the required skill and expertise to provide the services
* The Government of Canada has implemented various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Security Requirements:**

* The Security Requirements for this project are identified in the Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) documents

**Invitation to Tender:**

Firms that consider themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System.

**Additional Information:**

* For additional information, please refer to the RFAP documents
* Contract award results will be posted on the DCC website
* For information on MERX fees, please visit [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing).

**Eligible Entities:**

Firms registered in the MERX system who have the necessary skills and expertise to provide the services are invited to submit their proposals.

For more information or to submit your proposal, please visit: [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)
